scripts.nugetMetrics.Extensions.MassTransit: yarn buildMetrics.Extensions.MassTransit && dotnet pack -c Release -o nuget src/Metrics.Extensions.MassTransit/Metrics.Extensions.MassTransit.csproj
scripts.buildMetrics: dotnet build -c Release --configfile nuget.config -o nuget src/Metrics/Metrics.csproj
scripts.nugetMetrics: yarn buildMetrics && dotnet pack -c Release src/Metrics/Metrics.csproj
